nodes.text: Space Battles was a magazine in circulation during the Clone Wars. Published by the Republic Naval Institute, it contained true accounts of historic space battles. Among the many posters featured in the starship of Clone Force 99, the Havoc Marauder, were the covers of two issues of Space Battles.

The first issue, featured a red background, with a squadron of BTL-B Y-wing starfighter/bombers led by Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano. In addition, the magazine issue featured two articles on its cover; Enormous Corellian Star Destroyers and Destroyer Droids. The date June 14, 4012 also appeared on the cover.
The second issue, featured a light blue background, with both a Providence-class Dreadnought and a Venator-class Star Destroyer on its cover.

Space Battles first appeared in "A Distant Echo", the second episode of the seventh season of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars, which aired on February 29, 2020. One of the issues of the magazine features the date June 14, 4012, which does not correspond to any known in-universe timelines.
